definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be, grow dark (NH id.; Aram. [[חֲשַׁח]], h.4ek; Ar. h.asika bear rancour, v. Lag:BN 30)—

be, grow dark, [[אוֹר]] Is 5:30, cf. (fig.) Job 18:6; [[הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] Is 13:10 (fig.); [[היום]] Ez Eze 30:18 (where rd. [[חשׁך]], for MT Baer [[חשׂך]]); Job 3:9 (subj. [[כוכבים]]), cf. Ec 12:2 (subj. [[השׁמשׁ]], [[האור]], [[הירח]], [[הכוכבים]]); impers. Mic 3:6; (si vera 1.; but rd. prob. [[וַחֲשֵׁכָה]], corresponding with [[לַיְלָה]] preceding).
have a dark colour: [[מִשְּׁחוֹר]] ´[[ח]] [[תָּֽאֳרָם]] La 4:8 darker than blackness is their visage; of the earth [[הָאֶרֶץ]] Ex 10:15.
grow dim La 5:17 (subj. [[עינינו]]), cf. Ps 69:24 (fig.), Ec 12:3 subj. [[הָראׁוֹת]] i.e. the eyes.
make dark, ´[[יום לילה הח]] Am 5:8; abs. cause darkness Je 13:16, Ps 105:28, cf. Am 8:9 ([[לארץ]]).
